title: Language Access Ordinance Compliance
description: Language Access Ordinance (LAO) data is collected through methods determined by the department's LAO liaison and reported to OCEIA for annual analysis. The data is managed and self-reported by methods determined by the LAO liaison. For more information about the ordinance and reporting information, please see: https://sfgov.org/oceia/language-access

columns.name: Fiscal Year
columns.description: Fiscal year in which the LAO compliance report was submitted

columns.name: Training for Public Contact Staff
columns.description: Are there trainings provided for staff who interact with the public?

columns.name: Completed Mandatory Training
columns.description: The LAO mandates that each department attend an annual training led by the Office of Civic Engagement and Immigrant Affairs.

columns.name: Submitted Report on Time
columns.description: Did the department submit their LAO compliance report on time?

columns.name: Written LAO Policy
columns.description: Does the department have its own internal language access policy?

columns.name: Total Language Services Budget
columns.description: Department's total budget for language services (translations, interpretations, etc.)

columns.name: Total Operating Budget
columns.description: Department's total budget for all operations.

columns.name: Current bilingual employees adequate?
columns.description: Is the number of bilingual employees currently employed at this department adequate?

columns.name: # CAN Bilingual Pub Cont Staff
columns.description: Number of public contact staff who speak Cantonese, as reported by the department.

columns.name: # MDRN Bilingual Pub Cont Staff
columns.description: Number of public contact staff who speak Mandarin, as reported by the department.

columns.name: # SPN Bilingual Pub Cont Staff
columns.description: Number of public contact staff who speak Spanish, as reported by the department.

columns.name: # FIL Bilingual Pub Cont Staff
columns.description: Number of public contact staff who speak Filipino (Tagalog), as reported by the department.

columns.name: # RUS Bilingual Pub Cont Staff
columns.description: Number of public contact staff who speak Russian, as reported by the department.

columns.name: # VIET Bilingual Pub Cont Staff
columns.description: Number of public contact staff who speak Vietnamese, as reported by the department.

columns.name: # Other Bilingual Pub Cont Staff
columns.description: Number of public contact staff who speak another language, as reported by the department.
